Detailed Description

Path command to draw a cubic Bezier curve.

See also:
SVG elliptical arc specification

Definition at line 114 of file Path.hpp.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SVG::CubicCurveTo::CubicCurveTo ( const Point &  inPoint,
const Point &  inCtlPoint 
)

Draw cubic bezier curve with one control point, using absolute coordinates.

Parameters:
inPoint End point of curve.
inCtlPoint Control point.
See also:
SVG quadratic curve specification

The beginning control point is assumed to be the reflection of the end control point on the previous command relative to the current point. If previous command is not a CubicCurveTo, assume the end control point is coincident with the current point.

The beginning control point is assumed to be the reflection of the end control point on the previous command relative to the current point. If previous command is not a CubicCurveTo, assume the end control point is coincident with the current point.
